text: CanICA automatically provides clever masking, which is nice. However, I sometimes want to simply apply the algorithm on already masked data. Passing `mask=False` should disable the masking process and allow a direct application of the algorithm.
title: Objects processing data should offer an option to take unmasked data.
clean_text: canica automat provid clever mask nice howev I sometim want simpli appli algorithm alreadi mask data pass disabl mask process allow direct applic algorithm

title: Objects processing data should offer an option to take unmasked data.
